Description: Sickle: wooden handle set with flint blades.
Curator's comments: Photograph published in Shirai, Proceedings of the International Workshop "Sedentism", Worldwide research perspectives for the shift of human societies from mobile to settled ways of life, 23/10 - 24/10/2008. Series: Forschungen zur Archäologie Außereuropäischer Kulturen (in press)
